text: Druzhba () is a rural locality (a selo) in Polyakovsky Selsoviet, Davlekanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 305 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 12 km from Davlekanovo, 3 km from Polyakovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Davlekanovsky District
title: Druzhba, Republic of Bashkortostan
